::KitKat::

She looked up from the monitor and looked at the progress on the 
Megatron clone.  It was about 25% complete.  She smiled and looked at 
Starscream. "do you know wnything about a temperal rift eminating 
from this planet? that's why I'm trying to duplicat that spider 
baby.  It gave me a message from Phobia.  It said that there was a 
temperal rift that wold destroy the galaxy or possably the universe.  
And it's coming from this planet. I was hoping to clone that spider 
baby and try to get more info from it." she sighed and sat down in 
teh chair next to her console. "I just don't know enough about it to 
know what to do.  I can't let anything happen to my pack. Not now, 
not after all that has happened. I have to protect my pack 
Starscream."  She looked at him and then to her console.  The clone 
was coming along nicely and would resemble Megatron exactly when it 
was completed.
